post_title: Inzaghi at today‚Äôs press conference: "Nico Paz has quality, he has everything. He will have a great career. I don't know him but I've heard good things about him, even on a human level. He has quality and he's physically good too"

comments.author: nemeths
comments.body: This is Inzaghi‚Äôs equivalent of ‚Äúplease, PLEASE, PLEAAASE!‚Äù

comments.author: blasphemics
comments.body: Frattesi for Paz switcheroo in January you heard it here first. Pulled fresh straight out of my arse.

comments.author: mc802
comments.body: Inzaghi has been dreaming of a physically gifted quality midfielder since Milinkovic Savic

comments.author: No-Anxiety6
comments.body: Very talented player but we have no excuses despite many injured defenders. Forza Inter!

comments.author: foocares
comments.body: That's kind of a weird statement. Inzaghi's official reply would usually be something like "No comments on players of other clubs and I would rather focus on my own players; I continue to trust the management who will do professional jobs for the goodness of club blah blah."

comments.author: PaninoTime
comments.body: So let's make it happen Simone!

comments.body: Nico Paz is only 20 years old with a good resume. We'll see how he plays today vs Inter.
